subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: With the Western Conference finals looming, Lamar Odom is hoping to avoid becoming another Chris Webber, an All-Star who retired without ever playing in the N.B.A. finals.
snippet: With the Western Conference finals looming, Lamar Odom is hoping to avoid becoming another Chris Webber, an All-Star who retired without ever playing in the N.B.A. finals.
